title: Detection of nitro-aromatics using C5N2 as an electrochemical sensor: a DFT approach
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30116-30126
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05600K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nabeela, Muhammad Ali Hashmi, Ahmad Nauman Shah Saqib, Aqsa Kamran, Ahmed Lakhani
Nitroaromatics are hazardous pollutants. This study investigates C5N2 as a sensor for 1,3-DNB, TNT, and picric acid using DFT. Picric acid exhibited the strongest interaction, indicating C5N2's potential as a selective sensor for nitroaromatics.
